revised_title: Exploring Bud Eccentricity and Divergence Angles in Cucurbitaceae
tldr: The author investigates the causes of bud eccentricity and large divergence angles between leaves in the Cucurbitaceae plant family. They discovered that an axillary bud's anodic position is influenced by a repelling force originating from an older leaf primordium. This phenomenon explains the large angles between successive leaves, as the anodic axillary bud encroaches on the space available for the next leaf, affecting its position and divergence angle.
